duckdns._comment: Only requred if OpenVPN is enabled
Duckdns is a dynamic dns service. When your home network ip address changes, your duckdns domain will be updated. make sure you configure depot.external_domain

github._comment: Only required if backup_library_config or openssh is installed
You're api key  needs gist read/write access to store persistent data and/or read:public_key to associate your ssh key with the root and depot users
This should be the id of your existing Depot created gist. When running the installer script, one will be creatd for you

greyhole._comment: before adding drives here, make sure they have been correctly added to fstab and formatted correctly.

pushover._comment: Pushover is used to send notifications regarding your server's status: downloads, software updates, outages, etc
